data.message: facebook developers please bring back the old image upload that u can't crop the image no matter what the size of the picture.

replies.message: Hey Anastacio. Have you tried cropping the picture during the upload process? Step-by-step instructions can be found here: http://bit.ly/2e8eRcI. Hope this helps. -Elizabeth

Facebook Hello band :))) can u help me to remove my 30 days block.. please fix it :(( i never again post photos with  something that violates facebook policies :)) can u fix my old profile back, facebook? :))))
Facebook, I think he talks about the new edit option in the buggy new Messenger. It's Snapchat No. 2 and we can no longer crop images to send.
